[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Zooniverse System (ZV) defines technical requirements for AI-driven discovery, classification, and validation.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: ZV applies AI-based validation and metadata enrichment for discovery and analysis.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: ZV integrates with databases, APIs, and third-party platforms.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: ZV provides web and mobile interfaces for discovery, recommendations, and validation workflows.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: ZV operates on cloud-based infrastructure, enabling distributed processing and scalable storage.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: ZV supports secure REST APIs for seamless data exchange with external applications.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: ZV ensures secure, scalable data exchange.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: ZV optimizes resources for large datasets.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: ZV maintains 24/7 uptime with fault-tolerant mechanisms.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: ZV supports multilingual metadata and adaptive interfaces.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: ZV connects with fingerprinting and metadata aggregation services.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: ZV enables content discovery, metadata enrichment, and validation.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: ZV supports general users for exploration and administrators for validation.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: ZV performance depends on dataset size and concurrent requests.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: ZV requires internet access, external APIs, and cloud services.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with third-party platforms for metadata enrichment via REST APIs.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall provide a REST API for external applications to access metadata and recommendations.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall enable metadata-based content discovery (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall generate AI-driven recommendations based on user profiles.
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall allow admins to annotate video segments for classification (REQ-DB-002).

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide an intuitive interface with accessible navigation (REQ-DSGN-002).

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall process metadata updates within 3 seconds to ensure real-time discovery.
[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall support 10,000 concurrent users with optimal response times (REQ-ATTR-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store metadata in a scalable, indexed database.
[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-002: The system shall manage video thumbnails and annotations using distributed storage.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall comply with GDPR for user data protection.
[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-002: The system shall implement OAuth 2.0 for secure authentication and access control.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall adhere to ISO/IEC 27001 for security management.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-002: The system shall encrypt data at rest and in transit.

[SEC] 3. Verification: Tests for discovery, performance, compliance, and usability.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: Architecture, metadata models, and API documentation.
[SEC] 5. References: REST API docs, GDPR, ISO/IEC 27001, and Zooniverse specifications.
